mapper.insert: insert into oa_user (USER_ID, USER_NAME, SEX, USER_ACCOUNT, PASSWORD, EMAIL, MOBILE, TELL, HIDDEN_TELL, ORDER_NUM, ORG_ID, STATUS, CREATE_TIME, MODIFY_TIME, LAST_LOGIN_TIME ) values (#{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sex,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{userAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tell,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{hiddenTell,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{orderNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{orgId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{status,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{lastLoginTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} )
mapper.update: update oa_user set USER_NAME = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SEX = #{sex,jdbcType=CHAR}, USER_ACCOUNT = #{userAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PASSWORD = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EMAIL = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MOBILE = #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TELL = #{tell,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, HIDDEN_TELL = #{hiddenTell,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ORDER_NUM = #{orderNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ORG_ID = #{orgId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=CHAR}, CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, MODIFY_TIME = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, LAST_LOGIN_TIME = #{lastLoginTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where USER_ID = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select USER_ID, USER_NAME, SEX, USER_ACCOUNT, PASSWORD, EMAIL, MOBILE, TELL, HIDDEN_TELL, ORDER_NUM, ORG_ID, STATUS, CREATE_TIME, MODIFY_TIME, LAST_LOGIN_TIME from oa_user where USER_ID = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select USER_ID, USER_NAME, SEX, USER_ACCOUNT, PASSWORD, EMAIL, MOBILE, TELL, HIDDEN_TELL, ORDER_NUM, ORG_ID, STATUS, CREATE_TIME, MODIFY_TIME, LAST_LOGIN_TIME from oa_user
